divs: Sighting DetailsI was attending a Halloween party at a private home. I think it was a Sat. night. I had no alcohol at all. I was outside on Clematis St., talking with others facing me. I looked up in the sky and saw the saucer plain as day, suspended there, and as soon as I caught sight of it it sped away, disappearing as it went. It either had a cloaking type of device or the clouds enveloped it. Noone else saw it. I was too afraid they would think I was "nuts." I just stood there, probably saying, "Oh my G-d" a few times if I remember that correctly. The only thing I could have been was some sophisticated, rather large hologram someone was using for a Halloween stunt. No idea if possible. It was very plain that it was like a traditional UFO saucer. Have always wondered if anyone else saw this. Didn't know until now to make the report. Someone else I know (a professional) said they had a very similar encounter-not the same date (don't know where and when).
Summary: clear, large saucer with bright green lights all around seen just below cumulus clouds stationary at 1st then moved very swiftly and disappeared into clouds
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Sarasota
There were no other sightings in Sarasota on or around October 29th 2005
